comment.author: 45908511@N06
comment._content: Back in those days they used one track for both directions. Trains had to draw aside to sidetracks exactly in time for other trains to pass. Due to inadequate watches things went awry a lot of times!  Accidents like this one led to the development of highly accurate watches for the railway personnel.
